data.title: Sigma Pi Fraternity, Alpha Chapter
data.meta_description: Sigma Pi (ΣΠ), Alpha Chapter was founded on February 26, 1897 at Vincennes University, Vincennes, Indiana as a literary society.  Today, Sigma Pi, is the leading, international men&amp;amp;#39;s collegiate fraternal organization.
data.text:
Our History

The history of Sigma Pi is a proud and colorful one. Founded by four men at Vincennes University, the Founders of Sigma Pi little dreamt the Fraternity would develop into anything beyond a local organization.

About Us

VU's Chapter of Sigma Pi Fraternity is committed to helping men strive or excellence in their lives. As a fraternity we strive to uphold the values through our academic work, our social lives, and our leadership on campus.
